document_data.name: Isanan
document_data.mainbody: '''Isanan''' was a [[wizard]] from then city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[Sembia]], who lived many years before the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Isanan was the third person to own a unique [[enchanted]] [[Myrkulyte]] [[belt]] â€“ the ''[[Belt of Bones]]''. He purchased the belt from an unnamed grave robber who desecrated and looted the final resting place of the fierce [[warrior]] named [[Proud Keth]], the belt's original master. The ''Belt of Bones'' served Isanan well for many years after that. When the wizard's career culminated in retirement, he sold the belt to a very grateful adventuring [[cleric]] of [[Myrkul]] named [[Ben-Karad]], years before the {{YearlinkName|1281}}.
